Package com.purnendu.quizo.models

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.purnendu.quizo.models.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a quiz question entity in the Quizo application. This class is designed as a Room Entity for database persistence, storing all details required for a multiple-choice question. Each question has a unique auto-generated primary key.

Key fields include:

  • id: A unique identifier for the question, auto-generated by the database.
  • topic: The subject category of the question (e.g., "Math", "Literature", "Computer").
  • questionText: The actual text of the question.
  • optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD: The four possible answer choices.
  • correctAnswer: The text of the correct answer among the options.
Version:
2.0.1
Author:
Purnendu Guha
